lead_paragraph: Mike Singletary scored 27 points as No. 20 Texas Tech rallied with a strong second half at home to beat McNeese State.
snippet: Mike Singletary scored 27 points as No. 20 Texas Tech rallied with a strong second half at home to beat McNeese State.

headline.main: Texas Tech Tightens Its Defense Just in Time
headline.seo: Better Defense Helps No. 20 Texas Tech Top McNeese State
headline.print_headline: Texas Tech Tightens Its Defense Just in Time
